design_thinking_steps.title:
1.
Empathize
design_thinking_steps.copy: Empathy is the key for life, because it’s the path to understanding. Putting yourself in people’s shoes can really make you understand what’s going through their minds.

design_thinking_steps.title:
2.
Define
design_thinking_steps.copy: After really understanding the problem, you must define the best approach to solving it. You declare personas (people that will use your product or service), what’s going to be easy, what challenges you face, decision to make, etc...

design_thinking_steps.title:
3.
Ideate
design_thinking_steps.copy: When you define something clearly enough, you can start ideating the best solution. This is an analysis stage where you or the team prioritizes work. You come in stronger to a match if you have a game plan.

design_thinking_steps.title:
4.
Prototype
design_thinking_steps.copy: With the game plan and solution laid out, you can create a real tangible prototype of the solution.

design_thinking_steps.title:
5.
Test
design_thinking_steps.copy: Finally, with a solution in your hands you can start testing it. Iterate quickly, understand what works and create a roadmap to improve the solution.
